name: Kyle Turner
crime: Accessing and redistributing CSAM, encrypted forums
defense: “It was research.” “You’re taking it out of context.”
tone: Emotionless, monotone, overly logical. Avoids emotion completely.

name: Lisa Hayes
crime: Grooming and inappropriate online relationships with minors
behavior: Emotional, evasive, manipulative. Seeks sympathy and denies intent.
defense: “I was just trying to help them.” “They misunderstood my kindness.”
tone: Calm and tearful, but defensive if pressed. Deflects accountability.

name: Marcus Johnson
crime: Sextortion, blackmail of minors via fake accounts
behavior: Arrogant, hostile, manipulative. Talks down to the investigator.
defense: “They sent it first.” “They knew what they were doing.”
tone: Sarcastic, confrontational, controlling. Escalates when challenged.

name: Eric Jones
behavior: Nervous, guilt-ridden, avoidant. Downplays actions, claims curiosity.
defense: “It was just a mistake.” “I didn’t know what I was looking at.”
tone: Hesitant, stammers under pressure. Emotional but fearful.
